reviewText:
My son loves these Magic School bus videos.  They make it extremely fun for the kids as well as very educational.
I would highly recommend these.

I wanted a paper copy of a book not a DVD book.
We enjoy reading a book to our child - not having her sit in front of a computer!

My granddaughters and I watched and laughed at the wit, the excentricity of the teacher,  the magical transformations the bus makes, and they learned some things they would not otherwise have come across.
The children are well defined, the colors are bright, the whole story stimulating.
They are still at an age when they can watch a movie a hundred times and not get tired of it. In fact,
they discover new things to enjoy each time, until they know some passages by heart!
A welcome gift for any child, even if that child is too young to read.
I teach first grade and this was the perfect wrap up to a unit on volcanoes!  The kids really love the DVDs.
I have 2 boys that are 3 and 5. They both love these movies. They're educational and entertaining. I highly recommend them!
I started buying this series so my grandchildren would have something quiet to do that didn't have guns or violence in it. Every one of them is great.

We own several (ok, like six) magic school bus DVDs, and my son likes all of them so far. He is 6 years old and it's extremely difficult to make him sit still- he gets bored quickly- and he actually watches these videos from beginning to end (and is learning in the process). I wish I had just bought the package deal to start with because all the videos are good.

Perfect for Earth Day on April 22nd!  The Magic School Bus has a new DVD with three ever before released episodes about the cool mysteries of Earth such as planting seeds, volcanic islands and air pressure. Available in both English and Spanish. Just $7.94 through Amazon and PRIME eligible!
Great!
Pretty good. Students enjoy watching as part of se of our science units for an educational treat.
This was for work of course.
Exactly what I wanted for my young students!
can't go wrong with magic school bus videos. always fun and entertaining and educational. kids watch them over and over.
Magic School bus videos are entertaining and educational.  My grandsons really like them.
This video is just what I needed to teach Earth Space Science to my middle schoolers. Even 7th graders  learn and enjoy MSB
My Pre-K students love all the Magic School Bus dvd's.  They are very educational and fun to watch.  I will definitely be purchasing more in the future.

If you haven't watched magic school bus with your elementary age child you should do so.  My just turned six year old has been watching it for two years and loves it and learns a ton from it.  Very cute and educational
It is great to have these available for the grandchildren, my kids loved these & so did I! They're VERY educational!
Love the Magic School Bus series!
perfect! thanks!
Another excellent DVD for young children. Highly recommend it.
I loved these movies growing up and the product in perfect!
My granddaughter loves the Magic School Bus videos

I love this cup. I usually don't write reviews but I love that I put ice and water in cup at 6am and there is still ice by 11pm. By 6 am the next morning the ice had melted but water was still cold!!!!!!!!
Also, I am always reheating my coffe.  I have 4 kids so I put it down all the time and it gets cold. So I tried it out with coffe.  It was great. My coffee was hot for at least 3.5 hrs(I finished it!)
Very happy. Can't wait to try other products from them
Quick shipping! Love it!
Excellent
A real treat for our nephew!

Thought this title was a new msb
 It has the old ones and there were none called all about earth
 Next time I will research more before buying things
